attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers should only be allowed to accept the same percentage pay rise as those that they sanction. If the Health Minister considers 2% to be a fare offer to the nurses then she should also accept the same fair offer

rejection.details: there are petitions already on the site which cover MPs pay
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
